application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by part Condition 3(d) (Submission of details - finish for acoustic screen) of listed building consent LB/21/07063 (Replacement of windows at front and rear third floor level with timber framed sash windows. Installation of railings and skylight to second floor terrace. Addition of timber glazed  doors to rear ground floor infill. Installation of window between retained bay windows. Installation of doors and windows at lower ground floor level, leading to courtyard and front light well. Installation of glazed rooflight over rear lightwell to enclose lower ground floor courtyard. Installation of sawn Yorkstone to front light well and staircase. Removal of water tanks and installation of AC system at roof level. Rationalisation of external pipework and other features on front and rear elevations. Internal refurbishment and alterations to internal architectural features including cornices, skirtings and doors. Internal addition of fan coil units within fitted joinery)
